author: sroychow
body:
#### PR description:

This PR introduces Rechi monitoring modules for pixels for CPU and GPU workflows. There is a base class where the histo booking, filling are done.  Related [talk](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1134995/#13-gpu-cpu-dqm-modules-for-tra)

#### PR validation:
Checks done with 11634.501, 11634.506

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
title: DQM modules to monitor Pixel RecHits for heterogenous workflows
